availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Ripley, Brown County, Ohio. A Vermont-born house carpenter.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 32.

Find A Grave, Entry for Harvey Palmer (1807-1880), Find A Grave Memorial # 23993754, Maplewood Cemetery, Ripley, Brown County, Ohio, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=palmer&GSfn=harvey&GSbyrel=all&GSdy=1880&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=23993754&df=all& (accessed 30 June 2017).
